title: 1 token of Falcon 180B in West US
description:
In the absence of reliable data on the energy consumption of Falcon 180B, this information is extrapolated from the freely available language model Falcon 7B. The number of parameters in Falcon 7B is 7 billion, whereas Falcon 180B has a much larger parameter count of 180 billion.

Therefore, we assume that submitting a query to Falcon 180B requires 2.5x more energy.
